mapper.select: SELECT g.GAME_NO, m.USER_NO, m.MERCENARY_FOOT, m.MERCENARY_INTRO, m.MERCENARY_RATE, m.MERCENARY_POSITION, g.USER_ID FROM MERCENARY_INFO m LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON m.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GAME g ON u.USER_ID = g.USER_ID WHERE g.GAME_NO = #{game_no} AND m.USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY USER_NO DESC

SELECT t.TEAM_NO, u.USER_NO, m.USER_NO, m.MERCENARY_FOOT, m.MERCENARY_INTRO, m.MERCENARY_RATE, m.MERCENARY_POSITION FROM MERCENARY_INFO m LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON m.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_INFO t ON m.USER_NO = t.TEAM_NO WHERE m.USER_NO = #{user_no} AND t.TEAM_NO = #{team_no} ORDER BY m.USER_NO DESC

SELECT g.GAME_NO, m.USER_NO, m.MERCENARY_INTRO, m.MERCENARY_FOOT, m.MERCENARY_RATE, m.MERCENARY_POSITION, u.USER_ID FROM MERCENARY_INFO m LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON m.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GAME g ON g.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE m.USER_NO = #{user_no} AND g.GAME_NO = #{game_no}
